author: felixweber
title: Cardano Ambassadors & Latin America
description: We need skilled and experienced Community Members which are able to provide guidance and mentorships when onboarding Latin America
solution: Building a Team of Latin American Catalyst Community Experts & Cardano Ambassadors to provide high quality onboarding services
experience: Cardano Ambassadors, Community Mangaers, SPOs, Funded Proposers, veteran Community Advisors, Mentors and Cardano Experts
